title: Portable visual assay for anthrax biomarker based on lanthanide coordination polymer nanoparticles and smartphone-integrated mini-device
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1170-1178
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00707C, Paper
Shengnan Yin, Tianlun Xu
A novel portable sensor based on LML-Tb3+-AMP NPs and a custom-built device was fabricated for real-time and visual detection of anthracis biomarker.
